column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Melody Thomas
#Text=Scott
#Text=: Our show has always reflected the pertinent issues of the real world , so of course , that is constantly changing .
#Text=Making the transition from a half hour to an hour was seamless , and that happened in 1980 , my second year on the show .

#Text=As long as we have riveting character-driven stories , excellent actors and someone at the helm to make sure the look of the show remains unique and mesmerizing , we continue to hold the tradition that Bill Bell created .
#Text=Michelle Stafford : Yeah , it 's changed a lot but anything that goes on for a long time changes .
#Text=Nothing stays the same .
#Text=I liked it then and I like it now too .
#Text=Tricia Cast : Well , to be honest , I do n't watch a lot of TV .
#Text=To be really honest , I did n't watch it much when I was on it either , and oftentimes did n't know what was going on with the other characters .
#Text=Is that bad ?
#Text=Mike Halterman : What does being associated with Y&R mean to you ?
#Text=What 's the one thing you feel has impacted your life for the better from your association with the show ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott : Y&R changed my life in very significant ways .
#Text=Probably more so than anyone else .
#Text=It was through the show that I met my husband ( [ we ] will be married for 23 years this October ) , had my children and given me the beautiful life that I live .
#Text=God was and still is smiling down on me !
#Text=Michelle Stafford : I made money as an actress and that 's always a good thing .
#Text=I 'm always a fan of making money .
#Text=Tricia Cast : Aside from being honored to be part of the best show on daytime , I learned so much in the time I was there .
#Text=I 'm a better technician for having worked there .
#Text=Mike Halterman : In terms of writing and depth of character , do you think your character is stronger now than she was , say , a decade ago ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott : Hopefully she has learned more about life , which always makes a person smarter and therefore stronger .
#Text=However , there are parts of her makeup that never change .
#Text=For example , thinking with her heart and not her head .
#Text=She will forever be vulnerable in the romance department and perhaps in the business world as well .
#Text=I think she probably feels she is smarter than she actually is !
#Text=But that 's one of the things we love her for , is n't it ?
#Text=Michelle Stafford :
#Text=You know what , some people would disagree with me but I think she is stronger now .
#Text=She 's not whacking out every second of the day .
#Text=Mike Halterman : Out of all the storylines you 've been involved in , which one was your favorite ?
